decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly use cards like Entomb and Animate Dead to cheat powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier into play from the graveyard. The deck also utilizes counter spells like Force of Will and disrupts opponents with cards like Thoughtseize. The inclusion of Brazen Borrower and Murktide Regent provide additional threats, while Troll of Khazad-d√ªm can provide card advantage. Overall, this deck aims to win by reanimating big threats and controlling the game with disruptive spells.

The main concept of this deck is to use the combo of Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill the opponent's entire library. The deck includes cards to help assemble the combo quickly, protect it from disruption, and generate additional mana to accelerate the process. Emry, Lurker of the Loch provides recursion for key pieces, while Force of Will offers protection against opposing interaction. The deck aims to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy while setting up the win condition of milling out the opponent with the Painter's Servant combo.

The deck focuses on using various spells and creatures to quickly assemble key combo pieces and win the game in a single turn. By utilizing cards like Agadeem's Awakening, Dark Ritual, and Simian Spirit Guide to generate mana, the player can efficiently play out cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer to mill their entire deck into the graveyard. This allows them to then use cards like Dread Return or Reanimate to bring back Thassa's Oracle and win the game instantly by decking themselves out. The deck also includes disruption like Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize to protect the combo.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with creatures and spells, using cards such as Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal to generate mana for explosive plays. The goal is to use cards like Balustrade Spy to mill the entire library, triggering Thassa's Oracle or Dread Return to win the game on the spot. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Pact of Negation and Cabal Therapy to protect its combo and disrupt opponents. Overall, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and win the game before the opponent can react.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures such as Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler, supported by efficient counterspells like Daze and Force of Will. The deck also utilizes cards like Lightning Bolt and Murktide Regent to control the board and deal direct damage. Additionally, the deck includes land destruction with Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base. The goal is to maintain tempo and continuously apply pressure on the opponent to secure a fast victory.

The deck aims to quickly and efficiently bring out powerful creatures such as Emrakul, the Aeons Torn using the card Show and Tell along with Omniscience to play them for free. It also includes counterspells like Force of Will and Spell Pierce to protect the combo, as well as card selection and filtering cards like Brainstorm and Ponder to find the necessary pieces. Additionally, cards like Cunning Wish and Veil of Summer provide additional flexibility and protection, making the deck versatile and resilient against disruption.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by disrupting the opponent's plays with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze, as well as removal like Swords to Plowshares. It aims to control the tempo of the game with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Lavinia, Azorius Renegade, while also drawing cards and filtering through the deck with Brainstorm and Ponder. The deck also uses powerful threats like Murktide Regent and Hullbreacher to close out the game quickly once the opponent is under control.
